sosuke-aizen.name: Sosuke Aizen
sosuke-aizen.quote: From the very start, no one has stood upon the heavens. Not you, not I, nor even gods. However, that intolerable vacuum has come to an end. Henceforth...I shall stand upon the heavens.
sosuke-aizen.description: Former Captain of Squad 5 who orchestrated a complex and devastating betrayal of Soul Society. His immense power is matched only by his ambition and masterful manipulation of others, all in pursuit of subjugating the Hōgyoku, transcending the boundaries between Shinigami and Hollow in order to form the Oken, and thus, to claim his throne atop the heavens. As a Short Range fighter, Aizen simply awaits his enemies, combining precise Melee combat with almighty defensive abilities that can negate damage. Aizen's unique Gimmick mechanic, the 'Hōgyoku Fusion Level' Gauge, which fuels his Ramper playstyle - This allows him to gradually increase in power throughout the battle, evolving into different forms that grow in power. Once Awakening to his Third Form, Aizen uses his Reviver perk that allows him to use his Reawakening and transcend the natural order of the world. With the highest stat total in the game, exceptional Power, Defense, and Technique, and decent Speed and Range, Aizen excels at methodically dismantling opponents through careful ability usage, strategic planning and constant evolution.
sosuke-aizen.tldr: The Squad 5 Captain. A traitor who weilds great power. Ranks among the mightiest in terms of Spiritual Pressure. His Fighting Spirit accumulates automatically. His Exclusive Ability: Hōgyoku Fusion - Second Phase gradually awakens his powers. Once in Chrysalis State, he can Awaken with additional Fighting Spirit. His Exclusive Ability: Inexhaustible Spiritual Power changes his Special Flash Attacks and Spiritual Pressure Moves according to his Spiritual Power Reserve. To evolve into his Chrysalis State, fill your Fighting Spirit to maximum. To evolve into his Broken Chrysalis State, use Awakening after filling your Fighting Spirit to maximum a second time. To evolve into his Complete Hōgyoku Fusion form, use Reawakening by losing all of your Konpaku with a third instance of a full Fighting Spirit Gauge.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Inexhaustible Spiritual Power
base.description: An ability exclusive to Sosuke Aizen. The Reiatsu Gauge is replaced with a special version. Spiritual Power increases automatically, filling up to 5 stocks. The number of Stocked Spiritual Power changes some attack properties. Stopping in place speeds up Spiritual Power accumulation, with actions like attacks resetting the speed.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Hōgyoku Fusion - Second Phase
base.description: An ability exclusive to Sosuke Aizen. Fighting Spirit increases over time from the start of battle, activating this when it maxes out. Fighting Spirit is reduced to 0%, but Sosuke Aizen changes form, and this move is replaced with a special version. Inexhaustible Spiritual Power is negated during Hōgyoku Fusion - Second Phase.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Restricted Spiritual Power
base.description: An ability exclusive to Sosuke Aizen. The Reiatsu Gauge is replaced with a special version. When in Sosuke Aizen has triggered 'Exclusive Ability: Hōgyoku Fusion - Second Phase', his 'Exclusive Ability: Inexhaustible Spiritual Power' changes to this automatically. Whilst 'Exclusive Ability - Restricted Spiritual Power' is active, Aizen cannot spend any of his Stocked Spiritual Power charges, locking him out of his Spiritual Pressure Move 2. Aizen automatically loses this Exclusive Ability when Awakening.

base.name: Exclusive Ability: Shatter, Kyōka Suigetsu
base.description: Sosuke Aizen's exclusive ability. Can only be activated in Normal State. Press the Awakening input when certain characters are performing Kikon Moves to consume two Reverse Gauge bars and negate Konpaku destruction once per battle. This Exclusive Ability is unable to be performed on Ichigo Kurosaki, Ichigo Kurosaki (Bankai), Ichigo Kurosaki (Final Getsugatensho), Uryu Ishida, Yasutora 'Chad' Sado, and Kaname Tōsen as they have never seen Aizen's Kyōka Suigetsu release.

base.name: Signature Move: Powerful Spiritual Pressure
base.description: Stand calmly with your left hand raised. Maintains this pose whilst the input is pressed, preventing flinching and reducing damage when attacked. Unleashes a shockwave forward when the input is released, or enough time passes. Taking an attack while in this stance makes you unleash a powerful shockwave, after which Spiritual Power instantly starts filling up at max speed. The values below are split between not countering damage, and after countering damage.

base.name: Signature Move: A Process of Evolution
base.description: Powerful Spiritual Pressure changes into this during Hōgyoku Fusion - Second Phase. Stand calmly with your left hand raised. Maintains this pose whilst the input is pressed, preventing flinching and reducing damage when attacked. Unleashes a shockwave forward when the input is released, or enough time passes. Taking an attack while in this stance makes you unleash a powerful shockwave, after which you gain a lot of Fighting Spirit. The values below are split between not countering damage, and after countering damage.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: El Escudo
base.description: Erect a wall of Spiritual Pressure around yourself. Activating this drains the Guard Gauge continuously and prevents flinching from enemy attacks. Released when the Guard Gauge reaches 0, putting you in Guard Break.

base.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Hado #90 - Kurohitsugi
base.description: An immensely powerful Kurohitsugi attack. Can activate at Stocked Spiritual Power 1 or higher, consuming all stocks on activation. Starts with a forward sweep with Breaker properties. Unblockable, though it lacks range. The following Kurohitsugi increases when more Stocked Spiritual Power is consumed. The values below are split between each Stocked Spiritual Power amount.

base.name: Basic Flash Attack
base.description: An effortless slash worthy for only the weakest of peons.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Assault
base.description: Approach and slash at the opponent. Sends the opponent flying on hit, letting you make some distance between you.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Hado #54 - Haien
base.description: Changes Assault at Stocked Spiritual Power 2 or higher. Unleashes a Haien forward. Boasts a fine balance of speed and power.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Hado #91 - Senjukotentaiho
base.description: Can activate at Stocked Spiritual Power 4 or higher. Unleashes a Senjukotentaiho forward. Hold the input to switch between this and Hado #54 - Haien. Slow to activate, but extremely powerful.

base.name: Special Flash Attack: Kegeki
base.description: Special Flash Attack changes to this during Hōgyoku Fusion - Second Phase. Approach the opponent and launch a kick. Gives you the advantage in moving after the attack.

base.name: Basic Quick Attack
base.description: Cull the weak with a downwards slash.

awakened.name: Awakening: Chrysalis Shattering
awakened.description: Aizen's otherworldly cocoon splits apart, revealing Aizen's new, longer-haired form. Notably, Aizen seems to adopt more Hollow traits to his existing Shinigami form as his previously skin-tight shell now flows outwards like a godly, alien raiment.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Inexhaustible Spiritual Power
awakened.description: An ability exclusive to Sosuke Aizen. The Reiatsu Gauge is replaced with a special version. Spiritual Power increases automatically, filling up to 5 stocks. The number of Stocked Spiritual Power changes some attack properties. Stopping in place speeds up Spiritual Power accumulation, with actions like attacks resetting the speed.

awakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Complete Hōgyoku Fusion
awakened.description: A signature Reawakened state for Sosuke Aizen. Activates at 0 Konpaku if you have enough Fighting Spirit for Reawakening.

awakened.name: Signature Move: Powerful Spiritual Pressure
awakened.description: Stand calmly with your left hand raised. Maintains this pose whilst the input is pressed, preventing flinching and reducing damage when attacked. Unleashes a shockwave forward when the input is released, or enough time passes. Taking an attack while in this stance makes you unleash a powerful shockwave, after which Spiritual Power instantly starts filling up at max speed. The values below are split between not countering damage, and after countering damage.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: El Escudo
awakened.description: Erect a wall of Spiritual Pressure around yourself. Activating this drains the Guard Gauge continuously and prevents flinching from enemy attacks. Released when the Guard Gauge reaches 0, putting you in Guard Break.

awakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Hado #90 - Kurohitsugi
awakened.description: An immensely powerful Kurohitsugi attack. Can activate at Stocked Spiritual Power 1 or higher, consuming all stocks on activation. Starts with a forward sweep with Breaker properties. Unblockable, though it lacks range. The following Kurohitsugi increases when more Stocked Spiritual Power is consumed. The values below are split between each Stocked Spiritual Power amount.

awakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Assault
awakened.description: Approach and slash at the opponent. Sends the opponent flying on hit, letting you make some distance between you.

awakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Hado #54 - Haien
awakened.description: Changes Assault at Stocked Spiritual Power 2 or higher. Unleashes a Haien forward. Boasts a fine balance of speed and power.

awakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Hado #91 - Senjukotentaiho
awakened.description: Can activate at Stocked Spiritual Power 4 or higher. Unleashes a Senjukotentaiho forward. Hold the input to switch between this and Hado #54 - Haien. Slow to activate, but extremely powerful.

reawakened.name: Reawakening: Birth of the New God
reawakened.description: Aizen falls, supposedly defeated, before being forcibly revived by the Hōgyoku. An impossible pillar of purple flaming Reiryoku swells, bursting with Aizen in the centre, reborn and ready to claim that intolerable vacancy in the heavens as the universe's new God.

reawakened.name: Exclusive Ability: Interdimensional Spiritual Power
reawakened.description: Spiritual Power is always maxed out, and does not go down.

reawakened.name: Signature Move: Origins of Spiritual Pressure
reawakened.description: Fend off opponent attacks with the glow from the Hōgyoku. Take an attack at just the right time and counter by swiping a torrent of Reiryoku at the opponent.

reawakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 1: Power Transcending Shinigami and Hollow
reawakened.description: Release Spiritual Power, then sweep your blade while rushing forward. Fast activation makes this attack perfect for a combo finisher or an assault.

reawakened.name: Spiritual Pressure Move 2: Hado #90 - Kurohitsugi
reawakened.description: A forward sweep with Breaker properties. Unblockable, though it lacks range. When it hits, unleashes a Kurohitsugi with devastating power.

reawakened.name: Special Flash Attack: Sword Pressure
reawakened.description: Lightly swing your blade to release sword pressure. Has a wide attack range and excellent activation, making it perfect for keeping foes at bay from mid-range.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 1: Standing at the Top
kikon.description: Aizen raises his blade slowly, swelling and ebbing with purple Reiryoku as his ego grows, dominating over his opponent; with an effortless slice, he splits apart the very space between his foe and his blade, ravaging his opponent with a glittering, purple cleave. Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Normal State Kikon Move 2: Standing at the Top (Chrysalis)
kikon.description: Aizen raises his blade slowly, swelling and ebbing with purple Reiryoku as his ego grows, dominating over his opponent; with an effortless slice, he splits apart the very space between his foe and his blade, ravaging his opponent with a glittering, purple cleave. Destroys 2 Konpaku. Destroys 3 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 1: At the Edge of All Reason
kikon.description: Aizen walks calmly, his god-like Reiryoku weighing down on his foe as if gravity itself was their opponent. As the pressure builds, Aizen mocks his foe, he slices their abdomen with an incomprehensible cut. Destroys 3 Konpaku. Destroys 4 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Awakened Kikon Move 2: At the Edge of All Reason
kikon.description: Aizen walks calmly, his god-like Reiryoku weighing down on his foe as if gravity itself was their opponent. As the pressure builds, Aizen mocks his foe, he slices their abdomen with an incomprehensible cut. Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break.

kikon.name: Reawakened Kikon Move 1: Full Incantation Hado #90 - Kurohitsugi
kikon.description: Seeping model of Monshō. Insolent vessel of lunacy. Seethe. Deny. Paralyze. Flicker and disturb sleep. Crawling princess of iron. Constantly disintegrating doll of mud. Unite. Repel. Come back down to Earth and know your own powerlessness. Aizen recants this immensely powerful incantation to loose Hado #90 - Kurohitsugi upon his target, which takes the form of a colossal tower of blackened purple Reiryoku, seemingly formed with the building blocks of the universe itself. Its' interior, warping space and time to utterly eradicate Aizen's sworn enemy. Destroys 4 Konpaku. Destroys 5 Konpaku with a Soul Break.
